name: Beneath a CHUD Moon
description:
Use your many Debate Bro tactics to thwart alternative-fact-spouting CHUDs!

A variety of enemies:

  • CHUDs
  • Grifters
  • Theocratic Fascists
  • Brainless Talking Heads

All sorts of debate tactics:

  • Whip them with facts
  • Slice through their baseless arguments
  • Throw logic bombs (coming soon)

Weapons have different speeds, ranges, crit rate, etc.

Arrow keys to move, mouse to choose upgrades. Inspired by Vampire Survivors, Rogue: Genesia, Brotato, Boneraiser: Minions, and more!

*Game is subject to change at any time.
